    ui.gui  

    • Uses of Screen in ui.gui

      Subclasses of Screen in ui.gui 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GameEnding
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "Quit Game" button and (confirm that they really want to quit the game) in Main Menu
      class  GameStatus
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Game Status" button in Main Menu
      class  IslandBuysItem
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Are Buying" button in Visit Island Store Screen
      class  IslandProperties
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Island Properties" button in Main Menu
      class  IslandSellsItem  
      class  IslandStore
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Island Store" button in Main Menu
      class  MainScreen
      This class represents the Main Menu of the game after the user clicked the "Let's Play" button in Setup Screen
      class  PastPurchases
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Past Purchases and Sales" button in Main Menu
      class  SailingScreen
      This class represents the screen after the player sail to another island
      class  SetSailingIsland
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "Sail To Another Island" button in Main Menu
      class  SetupScreen
      This class represents the Setup Screen of the game
      class  ShipProperties
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Ship Properties" button in Main Menu
      class  ViewIslandBuysItem
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Buys" button in View Island Properties Screen
      class  ViewIslandRoutes
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "View Routes to This Island" button in View Island Properties Screen.
      class  ViewIslandSellsItem
      This class represents the screen after the user clicked the "See What We Sells" button in View Island Properties Screen
